sentences.en: A concrete control which supports editing a longitude value.
sentences.cn: 一种提供编辑经度值的控制器.

sentences.en: A similar feature is found at 13 degrees North between 230 degrees and 250 degrees longitude.
sentences.cn: 在北纬13度、经度230度到250度之间发现了类似的特征。

sentences.en: All places on the same meridian have the same longitude.
sentences.cn: 在同一子午线上的地方都有相同的经度.

sentences.en: All points on the same meridian have the same longitude.
sentences.cn: 同一条经线上的所有点经度相同.

sentences.en: Each point on Earth is specified by geographic latitude and longitude.
sentences.cn: 地球上每一点都可以用地理纬度和经度来确定.

sentences.en: Every place on the same meridian has the same longitude.
sentences.cn: 同一经线上的地方其经度相同.

sentences.en: He noted the latitude and longitude, then made a mark on the admiralty chart.
sentences.cn: 他记下纬度和经度，然后在航海图上做了个标记。

sentences.en: Our position is longitude 116 degrees east.
Photographs with GPS information stored inside EXIF block show longitude, latitude location.
sentences.cn: 照片与GPS的EXIF信息存储在块显示经度, 纬度位置.

sentences.en: Terrestrial longitude is measured in degrees east or west of the Greenwich meridian.
sentences.cn: 地球的经度是用格林尼治子午线向东或向西的度数来表示的.

sentences.en: The city is at longitude 21� � east.
The line of zero degree longitude passes through Greenwich.
sentences.cn: 经度零度线穿过格林威治.

sentences.en: The longitude of New York is 74 degrees west of Greenwich.
The town lies at longitude 12˚ east.

trans.tran_en: the distance of a place east or west of the Greenwich meridian, measured in degrees
